name: Stadium Renovator
description:
Buy and renovate abandoned stadiums. Replace turf, mow the grass, clean stands and many more! Prepare it for league competitions and other events. Be the one who finally bring back its previous glory!




Find neglected sport facilities and restore their former glory.





There’s a lot of work ahead of you! Sort the rubbish, renovate stadium stands, make the turf ready for the season. Not enough? Renovate installations and service spaces, as well as take care of area around the stadium.





Good turf is a key for a good game! Replace damaged grass, make sure it has proper height and irrigation - for this purpose use specialized equipment.





Take care of safety at the stadium! Install monitoring systems, safety gates and metal detectors.





Manage the facility finances! Organize sport and cultural events. Look for sponsors and advertisers.
